title: Not that long ago in a world you know… there was no internet!
text:
Not that long ago in a world you know… there was no internet!

mikos/123RF

The internet is a tool that has made everyday life so much easier!

Today you can find out whatever you want with just a click or a tap. You can even use voice command to get Siri, or Google, or Alexa or Cortana (there’s a lot of them!) to answer your question.

But can you imagine not having this super useful invention? That’s what it was like not that long ago!

What did everyday life look like then? And can we even guess what it will look like in the future?



OK, time for you to tell us what you think the future holds for the internet.
description: But what did our ancestors do without this super helpful invention? What did everyday life look like? And how did we complete the simplest of tasks?
